# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

Here's the function `wrap_string` along with an example:

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    lines = String[]
    line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = word
        else
            line *= " " * word
        end
    end
    push!(lines, line)

    return join(lines, "\n")
end

example_text = "This function will wrap words into lines"
wrapped_text = wrap_string(example_text)
println("Original text: \n$example_text\n")
println("Wrapped text: \n$wrapped_text\n")
```
